actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A bill to require that new forms and reports, and revisions of existing forms, resulting from legislation be contained in reports of committees reporting the legislation.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1970 to require that a statement accompany every public bill or joint resolution reported by a congressional committee containing a copy of the probable matter and format of each new form or report or revision of any existing form or report that is required by or is likely to result from the enactment of such bill or resolution and which is to be completed by someone other than an officer or employee of the Federal Government or any State government.

titles.title: A bill to require that new forms and reports, and revisions of existing forms, resulting from legislation be contained in reports of committees reporting the legislation.
